sentences.sentence: Then . . . I found little rootlets of affection for Ingleside beginning to sprout out.
sentences.translation: 然后，我发现壁炉山庄的影响开始扩张了。

sentences.sentence: Results: the number of the rootlets in every cervical dorsal root are almost the same.
sentences.translation: 结果：颈部各节段后根所含各级神经束的数目基本一致。

sentences.sentence: The microfilaments of some microvilli formed core rootlets and entered into the cytoplasm.
sentences.translation: 细胞游离面部分微绒毛的微丝形成中心根并深入胞质。
